snippet: The central bank kept monetary policy steady, and the prime minister unveiled a plan to cut corporate taxes.
abstract: Bank of Japan keeps monetary policy steady, offering slightly more upbeat view on overseas growth and signaling confidence that economy is on course to meet inflation targets without additional stimulus.
lead_paragraph: The central bank kept monetary policy steady, and the prime minister unveiled a plan to cut corporate taxes.

headline.main: An Upbeat View From the Bank of Japan
headline.print_headline: An Upbeat View From the Bank of Japan
